#summary Ember Media Manager Changelog

*Changes in Upcoming Release:*
 * Fix for extrathumbs being created even when not utilized
 * Fix for file type sources not loading all movies
 * Fix for incompatible media info

 * Fix for Ember not appearing on top when first opened (Needs verification)
 * Fix for IMDB single scraper not working in some instances (Needs verification)
 * Fix some elements of the interface not re-enabling after searching IMDB
